Title: The Case Against Social Media is Stronger Than You Think
Two Slice, a font that's only 2px tall
Description: A font that's only 2px tall, and somewhat readable!  Uppercase and lowercase have some different variants, in case you find one more readable than the other.  Numbers (sort of) and some punctuation marks are included.

Title: Stations and transfers
Description: A gallery of drawings depicting the topology of metro stations from different European cities.

Title: Magical systems thinking - Works in Progress Magazine
Description: Systems thinking promises to give us a toolkit to design complex systems that work from the ground up. It fails because it ignores that systems fight back.

Title: The Python Arcade Library — Python Arcade 3.3.2
Description:
Arcade is an easy-to-learn Python library for creating 2D games and more. The
friendly API caters to both beginners and experts alike. Do you want to craft
craft your take on a 2D classic, or explore the full power of shaders? It’s up to you.

Title: Git's hidden simplicity: what's behind every commit
Description: Many programmers would admit this: our knowledge of Git tends to be pretty… superficial.
